markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tengu Weapon Study](/Feats.aspx?ID=1318) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 27 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Tengu Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1314)

</column>

---

You've learned techniques for using blades and other tengu weapons. Whenever you critically hit using one of the weapons from your Tengu Weapon Familiarity, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.
name: Tengu Weapon Study

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 5" pfs="Standard" > Tengu Weapon Study Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 27 2.0 Prerequisites Tengu Weapon Familiarity --- You've learned techniques for using blades and other tengu weapons. Whenever you critically hit using one of the weapons from your Tengu Weapon Familiarity, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.
